channel.title: LunarByArrowz>TT Source< -
channel.description: so today i downloaded TeamTorva source today to mess around with a few things i wasnted to try and add which was 100% lunars, i did humidfy and after i finished it worked fine, but this i was looking and found a file called LunarByArrows.java, and in this java file was almost every lunar spell added, but they dont workk, i did copy and paste one into clickingbuttons.java to see if it worked and it did 100%, my questioon is can some1 help me like put a method somewhere to make this whole file work? it would be greaty apprecated (i was working on delta to make lunars work but delta is very limited with the amount of spells they have defaut so i moved to pi because it was every lunar spell in the book, but im not so good at PI) __________________________________________________ _____________ I tried adding it and i renamed doc to :lunars.java it was public which is somthing i dont get, im not the biggest person on java coding, heres my error [code]src\server\model\players\Client.java:44: error: cannot find symbol import server.model.players.lunars; ^ symbol: class lunars location: package server.model.players Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

item.title: LunarByArrowz>TT Source< -
item.dc:creator: @Cork Cork
item.description:
@Cork wrote:

so today i downloaded TeamTorva source today to mess around with a few things i wasnted to try and add which was 100% lunars, i did humidfy and after i finished it worked fine, but this i was looking and found a file called LunarByArrows.java, and in this java file was almost every lunar spell added, but they dont workk, i did copy and paste one into clickingbuttons.java to see if it worked and it did 100%, my questioon is can some1 help me like put a method somewhere to make this whole file work? it would be greaty apprecated (i was working on delta to make lunars work but delta is very limited with the amount of spells they have defaut so i moved to pi because it was every lunar spell in the book, but im not so good at PI)

I tried adding it and i renamed doc to :lunars.java
it was public which is somthing i dont get, im not the biggest person on java coding, heres my error

src\server\model\players\Client.java:44: error: cannot find symbol import server.model.players.lunars; ^ symbol: class lunars location: package server.model.players Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .
